Detailed Description

MCManager.h provides an way to communication with the remote control application ModularCommander.

Created on: March 8, 2009 Author: David Johan Christensen

Define Documentation

#define MC_BROADCAST   255

If receiver ID, recID, is set to MC_BROADCAST, the message will be broadcasted to all other modules in the robot.

#define MC_WILDCARD   254

If receiver ID, recID, is set to MC_WILDCARD, the message will be received by any module but will not be transmitted further to other modules.

Function Documentation

uint8_t MCManager_act (  ) 

Checks for new messages and generates call-back events to application code.

void MCManager_init (  ) 

Initialize the Modular Commander Manager.

void MCManager_installHandler ( uint8_t  mcType,
void(handler)(uint8_t, uint8_t *, uint8_t, uint8_t)   
)

Install a handler (call-back function) which will subscribe to events generated by a message being received on the module. The handler should take the following arguments:

  • handler(uint8_t mcType, uint8_t* payload, uint8_t payloadLength, uint8_t channel);

void MCManager_setID ( uint8_t  ID  ) 

Set the ID used by Modular Commander in this module.
